name: Majux Marketing
description:
Majux is a full-service digital marketing agency that provides SEO, PPC, web design and content marketing services for law firms, eCommerce, and Fortune 500 companies. We focus on one thing – increasing revenue through online channels. We also understand that every industry and goal requires a unique approach. See why so many companies trust our team and the results we provide. Specific to the legal industry, Majux is known as one of the leading providers of digital marketing solutions.
We work with dozens of firms in some of the most competitive markets across the country. It’s a space that we know well. Prior to founding Majux, the members of our management team spent a combined fifteen years in marketing management roles at regional law firms. That experience doesn't end with our management – we have attorneys, writers, and marketers that have all worked at law firms as part of our team. If there is a type of case, we’ve probably been down in the trenches chasing it. We think that our fresh perspective, transparency, and emphasis on results, is what our clients enjoy about working with us the most. Services we offer: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Website Design eCommerce Development and Marketing PPC, Adwords and Display Advertising (paid search) HTML5 Ad Design/Programming Content Creation/Management On-Site and Conversion Optimization Brand Protection Reputation Management Digital Marketing Consulting/Whitelabeling
